column5: Leftover Xmas eggnog, maybe-----drinking it on Easter??
Ya, TWN, bunch of numpties at best, special weather bulletins, chasing storms, etc.
TV forecasters are dummies.  As for the eggnog.....  We used to keep a crate in the freezer until summer for ice cold rum and eggnog that would make your teeth ache.
That's for the 36 hours after it stops dropping stuff from the sky.. when ever that ends!
